text: Dominic Raacke (born 11 December 1958) is a German actor and screenwriter. He is best known for his performance as Till Ritter in Tatort. He appeared in more than seventy films since 1981. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
